name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ枠・夜公演】SorAZ Major Debut Live『First Gravity』【 #SorAZGravity 】【ホロライブ ⧸ ときのそら ⧸ AZKi 】 [7oFSKRxKu7A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: SorAZ 'First Gravity' promotional medley cycle 1, featuring song previews and contributor credits.

subtitles.original: 展示未到のときめき知りたい人？
subtitles.english: Who wants to know an unprecedented thrill?

subtitles.original: いっせーの！で言っちゃいな！
subtitles.english: Say it on the count of three!

subtitles.original: 今だっていいじゃない！
subtitles.english: Right now is fine, too!

subtitles.original: いっせーの！で言っちゃいな！
subtitles.english: Say it on the count of three!

subtitles.original: 今だっていいじゃない！
subtitles.english: Right now is fine, too!

subtitles.original: 旧法を徒にする奴ぶっちゃいたい人？
subtitles.english: Who wants to blast those who follow the old rules?

subtitles.original: それって君じゃない！
subtitles.english: Isn't that you?

subtitles.original: 今日は言っちゃいいじゃない！
subtitles.english: You can say it today!

subtitles.original: M・E・G・A・M・E　そりゃマブの目
subtitles.english: M-E-G-A-M-E, those are the real eyes.

subtitles.original: ピンチこそ人生の醍醐味です
subtitles.english: Pinches are the real thrill of life.

subtitles.original: いっせーので出しちゃえ！
subtitles.english: Let's put it out on the count of three!

subtitles.original: 飛んでハート出しちゃえ！
subtitles.english: Jump and let your heart out!

subtitles.original: この際もうはや死角はない
subtitles.english: At this point, there are no blind spots left.

subtitles.original: 動かなかった足を今踏み出したいと思える
subtitles.english: I feel like I want to take a step with my feet that wouldn't move.

subtitles.original: 一人ではできなかった事よやっちゃお
subtitles.english: Let's do the things I couldn't do alone.

subtitles.original: いっちゃうよ！
subtitles.english: Here we go!

subtitles.original: いっせーのせ！
subtitles.english: On the count of three!

subtitles.original: 一個一個 ぶっ飛んでいくぞ
subtitles.english: One by one, we're gonna blast off!

subtitles.original: 君の体温上昇期はまだまだ
subtitles.english: Your body temperature is still rising.

subtitles.original: でも一歩一歩って進んでいくぞ
subtitles.english: But we're moving forward step by step.

subtitles.original: これが我らの第一歩
subtitles.english: This is our first step.

subtitles.original: しかと見ておいてくださいな
subtitles.english: Please make sure to watch closely.

subtitles.original: 転んだり迷ったりお気になさらず
subtitles.english: Don't worry about falling or getting lost.

subtitles.original: もうちょっと突き抜けてくださいませ
subtitles.english: Please break through a little more.

subtitles.original: 努力も尖る時に減速なんてな事ございません
subtitles.english: There's no slowing down when your efforts are peaking.

subtitles.original: 渾身的なメジャービジョン
subtitles.english: A wholehearted major vision.

subtitles.original: 星降るでしょうハッピーイェイ
subtitles.english: Stars will fall, happy yay!

subtitles.original: もしや今とてもいい感じ？
subtitles.english: Are things feeling great right now?

subtitles.original: もっとギア上げちゃっていい感じ？
subtitles.english: Is it okay to shift up a gear?

subtitles.original: 今日という日は一回だけ
subtitles.english: Today only happens once.

subtitles.original: だから目一杯声出してみよう Let's go, say!
subtitles.english: So let's shout as loud as we can. Let's go, say!

subtitles.original: オー・オー　世界一、アズキ！
subtitles.english: Oh oh! The best in the world, AZKi!

subtitles.original: オー・オー　いいよ、もっと、もう一回！
subtitles.english: Oh oh! That's it, more, one more time!

subtitles.original: オー・オー　宇宙一、楽しく！
subtitles.english: Oh oh! The most fun in the universe!

subtitles.original: オー・オー　あー、めっちゃ最高！
subtitles.english: Oh oh! Ah, this is the best!

subtitles.original: 過去も今だって未来に
subtitles.english: The past and even the present are for the future.

subtitles.original: 今は期待と足しちゃってみる
subtitles.english: I'll try adding my expectations to the now.

subtitles.original: 君がいたから見れた景色
subtitles.english: The scenery I saw because you were there.

subtitles.original: やっちゃうよ！いっちゃうよ！
subtitles.english: Let's do it! Let's go!

subtitles.original: いっせーのせ！
subtitles.english: On the count of three!

subtitles.original: 一个一个って突っ込んだものの
subtitles.english: I plunged in one by one, but...

subtitles.original: とどまってるでっかい世界にクラクラ
subtitles.english: Dizzy in this massive world where I'm stuck.

subtitles.original: でも一歩一歩を大事にするぞ
subtitles.english: But I'll cherish every single step.

subtitles.original: それが我らの第一歩
subtitles.english: That is our first step.

subtitles.original: いっせーのでぶっ飛んでいくぞ
subtitles.english: Let's blast off on the count of three!

subtitles.original: 君の体温上昇期はもうすぐ
subtitles.english: Your body temperature's rising phase is coming soon.

subtitles.original: この一歩一歩を楽しんでいくぞ
subtitles.english: We're going to enjoy these steps one by one.

subtitles.original: それじゃみんなで第一歩
subtitles.english: So now, everyone, our first step!

subtitles.original: しかと見ておいてくださいな
subtitles.english: Please make sure to watch closely.

subtitles.original: 転んだり迷ったりお気になさらず
subtitles.english: Don't worry about falling or getting lost.

subtitles.original: もうちょっと突き抜けてくださいませ
subtitles.english: Please break through a little more.

subtitles.original: 努力も尖る時に減速なんてな事ございません
subtitles.english: There's no slowing down when your efforts are peaking.

subtitles.original: ずっと見ていてくださいな
subtitles.english: Please keep watching us forever.

subtitles.original: 笑ってる弾んでる未来が見えませ
subtitles.english: Show us a laughing, bouncing future.

subtitles.original: テンポも心もご覧くださいませ
subtitles.english: Please see our tempo and our hearts.

subtitles.original: ときそらAZKiに退屈なんてな事ございません
subtitles.english: There's no such thing as boredom with Tokino Sora and AZKi.

subtitles.original: 渾身的なメジャービジョン
subtitles.english: A wholehearted major vision.

subtitles.original: 星降るでしょうハッピーイェイ
subtitles.english: Stars will fall, happy yay!
